name: openheroselect
description: Open Source HeroSelect for Marvel Ultimate Alliance (2006)

scripts.clean: npm i && npm run envsetup && node ./_build.js -c
scripts.fullclean: npm i && npm run envsetup && node ./_build.js -f
scripts.distpackage-x64: npm run fullclean && npm run build && node ./_build.js -p
scripts.distpackage-x86: npm run fullclean && npm run build32 && node ./_build.js -p 32
scripts.distpackagelinux-x64: npm run fullclean && npm run buildlinux && node ./_build.js -p linux-64
scripts.buildohs: npm run envsetup && node ./_build.js -t ohs -a win-x64
scripts.buildohs32: npm run envsetup && node ./_build.js -t ohs -a win-x86
scripts.buildohslinux: npm run envsetup && node ./_build.js -t ohs -a linux-x64

author: Tony Stark @ MarvelMods (TheRealPSV @ GitHub)
